name: Ghost Commander - BlackBerry edition
short_description:
Ghost Commander is a powerful, dual-panel, customizable, ad-free and donation supported file manager.

Once installed, you can efficiently manage your files, copying and moving them from one panel to another. This method of operating is far more convenient than what is offered by some other file managers, in which you would have to copy/cut items and then navigate to various different folders to paste them - back and forth, again and again.

Open files and folders by simply tapping on the left and select single or multiple items by tapping on the right side, where the size/date info is situated. 

Besides the basic file manager functions you would expect, Ghost Commander lets you transfer files both to and from FTP servers and Windows network shares, plus it can create/extract ZIP archives (enter to a ZIP file like it was a regular folder, then just copy the files).
summary: A file manager for the new BlackBerry platform
